018package org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl;
019
020import static java.util.Arrays.copyOfRange;
021import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.INTERNAL;
022import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.CollectionKind.NO_COLLECTION;
023import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec.PropertyFlag.ENVIRONMENT_VARIABLE;
024import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec.PropertyFlag.GETTER_IS_DEFAULT;
025import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec.PropertyFlag.PROPERTY_IS_SPECIAL;
026import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec.PropertyFlag.SYSTEM_PREFERENCE;
027import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec.PropertyFlag.SYSTEM_PROPERTY;
028import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.codebuilders.CodeGeneratorContext.getAddMethodComposer;
029import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.codebuilders.CodeGeneratorContext.getConstructorFragment4EnvironmentComposer;
030import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.codebuilders.CodeGeneratorContext.getConstructorFragment4SystemPreferenceComposer;
031import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.codebuilders.CodeGeneratorContext.getConstructorFragment4SystemPropComposer;

034import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.codebuilders.CodeGeneratorContext.getSetterComposer;

036import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.nonNull;

062/**
063 *  The implementation for
064 *  {@link PropertySpec}.
065 *
066 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
067 *  @version $Id: PropertySpecImpl.java 1006 2022-02-03 23:03:04Z tquadrat $
068 *  @since 0.1.0
069 *  @UMLGraph.link
070 */
071@SuppressWarnings( {"ClassWithTooManyFields", "OverlyComplexClass"} )
072@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: PropertySpecImpl.java 1006 2022-02-03 23:03:04Z tquadrat $" )
073@API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.1.0" )
074public final class PropertySpecImpl implements PropertySpec
075{
076       /*------------*\
077    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
078        \*------------*/
079    /**
080     *  The name for the 'add' method's argument.
081     */
082    private Name m_AddMethodArgumentName = null;
083
084    /**
085     *  The builder for the 'add' method of this property.
086     */
087    private MethodSpec.Builder m_AddMethodBuilder = null;
088
089    /**
090     *  The method that creates the 'add' method for this property.
091     */
092    private BiFunction<CodeBuilder,PropertySpecImpl,MethodSpec> m_AddMethodComposer;
093
094    /**
095     *  The name for the 'add'' method.
096     */
097    private Name m_AddMethodName;
098
099    /**
100     *  The argument index.
101     *
102     *  @see org.tquadrat.foundation.config.Argument#index()
103     */
104    private int m_CLIArgumentIndex = -1; // -1 means that the value was not set
105
106    /**
107     *  The special CLI format.
108     *
109     *  @see org.tquadrat.foundation.config.Argument#format()
110     *  @see org.tquadrat.foundation.config.Option#format()
111     */
112    private String m_CLIFormat = null;
113
114    /**
115     *  The CLI meta variable.
116     *
117     *  @see org.tquadrat.foundation.config.Argument#metaVar()
118     *  @see org.tquadrat.foundation.config.Option#metaVar()
119     */
120    private String m_CLIMetaVar = null;
121
122    /**
123     *  The names for a CLI option.
124     *
125     *  @see org.tquadrat.foundation.config.Option#name()
126     *  @see org.tquadrat.foundation.config.Option#aliases()
127     */
128    private List<String> m_CLIOptionNames = null;
129
130    /**
131     *  The CLI value handler class.
132     *
133     *  @see org.tquadrat.foundation.config.Argument#handler()
134     *  @see org.tquadrat.foundation.config.Option#handler()
135     */
136    private TypeName m_CLIValueHandlerClass = null;
137
138    /**
139     *  The CLI usage text.
140     *
141     *  @see org.tquadrat.foundation.config.Argument#usage()
142     *  @see org.tquadrat.foundation.config.Option#usage()
143     */
144    private String m_CLIUsage = null;
145
146    /**
147     *  The CLI usage key.
148     *
149     *  @see org.tquadrat.foundation.config.Argument#usageKey()
150     *  @see org.tquadrat.foundation.config.Option#usageKey()
151     */
152    private String m_CLIUsageKey = null;
153
154    /**
155     *  The kind of collection for this property.
156     */
157    private CollectionKind m_CollectionKind = NO_COLLECTION;
158
159    /**
160     *  The method that creates the constructor fragment for the initialisation
161     *  of this property.
162     */
163    private BiFunction<CodeBuilder,PropertySpecImpl, CodeBlock> m_ConstructorFragmentComposer;
164
165    /**
166     *  The name of the environment variable that is used to initialise this
167     *  property.
168     */
169    private String m_EnvironmentVariableName = null;
170
171    /**
172     *  The method that creates the field for this property.
173     */
174    private BiFunction<CodeBuilder,PropertySpecImpl,FieldSpec> m_FieldComposer;
175
176    /**
177     *  The name of the field for the property.
178     */
179    private String m_FieldName = null;
180
181    /**
182     *  The builder for the getter of this property.
183     */
184    private MethodSpec.Builder m_GetterBuilder = null;
185
186    /**
187     *  The method that creates the getter for this property.
188     */
189    private BiFunction<CodeBuilder,PropertySpecImpl,MethodSpec> m_GetterComposer;
190
191    /**
192     *  The name for the getter method.
193     */
194    private Name m_GetterMethodName = null;
195
196    /**
197     *  The return type for the getter method.
198     */
199    private TypeName m_GetterReturnType;
200
201    /**
202     *  The comment for this property when stored in an {@code INI} file.
203     */
204    private String m_INIComment = null;
205
206    /**
207     *  The group for this property when stored in an {@code INI} file.
208     */
209    private String m_INIGroup = null;
210
211    /**
212     *  The key for this property when stored in an {@code INI} file.
213     */
214    private String m_INIKey = null;
215
216    /**
217     *  The flag that indicates whether the property type is an {@code enum}
218     *  type.
219     */
220    private boolean m_IsEnum = false;
221
222    /**
223     *  <p>{@summary The {@code Preferences} accessor class.}</p>
224     *  <p>This is used when this property is linked to a preference, but also
225     *  to initialise it from a SYSTEM preference.</p>
226     *
227     *  @see org.tquadrat.foundation.config.Preference#accessor()
228     *  @see org.tquadrat.foundation.config.SystemPreference#accessor()
229     */
230    private TypeName m_PrefsAccessorClass = null;
231
232    /**
233     *  <p>{@summary The {@code Preferences} key.}</p>
234     *  <p>This is used when this property is linked to a preference, but also
235     *  to initialise it from a SYSTEM preference. In first case, the name is
236     *  defaulted to the property name, while it is mandatory otherwise.</p>
237     *
238     *  @see org.tquadrat.foundation.config.Preference#key()
239     *  @see org.tquadrat.foundation.config.SystemPreference#key()
240     */
241    private String m_PrefsKey = null;
242
243    /**
244     *  The property flags.
245     */
246    private final EnumSet<PropertyFlag> m_PropertyFlags = EnumSet.noneOf( PropertyFlag.class );
247
248    /**
249     *  The name of the property.
250     */
251    private final String m_PropertyName;
252
253    /**
254     *  The type of the property.
255     */
256    private TypeName m_PropertyType;
257
258    /**
259     *  The name for the setter's argument.
260     */
261    private Name m_SetterArgumentName = null;
262
263    /**
264     *  The builder for the setter of this property.
265     */
266    private MethodSpec.Builder m_SetterBuilder = null;
267
268    /**
269     *  The method that creates the setter for this property.
270     */
271    private BiFunction<CodeBuilder,PropertySpecImpl,MethodSpec> m_SetterComposer;
272
273    /**
274     *  The name for the setter method.
275     */
276    private Name m_SetterMethodName;
277
278    /**
279     *  The speciality type for this property; usually, this is {@code null}.
280     */
281    private SpecialPropertyType m_SpecialPropertyType = null;
282
283    /**
284     *  The class that implements the String converter for the type of this
285     *  property.
286     */
287    private TypeName m_StringConverterClass = null;
288
289    /**
290     *  The path for the SYSTEM preferences node that holds the initialisation
291     *  data for this property.
292     *
293     *  @see org.tquadrat.foundation.config.SystemPreference#path()
294     */
295    private String m_SystemPrefsPath = null;
296
297    /**
298     *  The name of the system property that is used to initialise this
299     *  property.
300     */
301    private String m_SystemPropertyName = null;

304    ====** Static Initialisations **===========================================

307        /*--------------*\
308    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
309        \*--------------*/
310    /**
311     *  Creates a new {@code PropertySpecImpl} instance.
312     *
313     *  @param  propertyName    The name of the property.
314     */
315    public PropertySpecImpl( final String propertyName )
316    {
317        m_PropertyName = requireNotEmptyArgument( propertyName, "propertyName" );
318    }   //  PropertySpecImpl()
319
320        /*---------*\
321    ====** Methods **==========================================================
322        \*---------*/
323    /**
324     *  {@inheritDoc}
325     */
326    @Override
327    public final Optional<MethodSpec> createAddMethod( final CodeBuilder codeBuilder )
328    {
329        final Optional<MethodSpec> retValue = isNull( m_AddMethodComposer ) || hasFlag( GETTER_IS_DEFAULT )
330            ? Optional.empty()
331            : Optional.of( m_AddMethodComposer.apply( requireNonNullArgument( codeBuilder, "codeBuilder" ), this ) );
332
333        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
334        return retValue;
335    }   //  createAddMethod()
336
337    /**
338     *  {@inheritDoc}
339     */
340    @Override
341    public Optional<CodeBlock> createConstructorFragment( final CodeBuilder codeBuilder )
342    {
343        final Optional<CodeBlock> retValue = isNull( m_ConstructorFragmentComposer ) || hasFlag( GETTER_IS_DEFAULT )
344            ? Optional.empty()
345            : Optional.of( m_ConstructorFragmentComposer.apply( requireNonNullArgument( codeBuilder, "codeBuilder" ), this ) );
346
347        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
348        return retValue;
349    }   //  createConstructorFragment()
350
351    /**
352     *  {@inheritDoc}
353     */
354    @Override
355    public final Optional<FieldSpec> createField( final CodeBuilder codeBuilder )
356    {
357        final Optional<FieldSpec> retValue = isNull( m_FieldComposer ) || hasFlag( GETTER_IS_DEFAULT )
358            ? Optional.empty()
359            : Optional.of( m_FieldComposer.apply( requireNonNullArgument( codeBuilder, "codeBuilder" ), this ) );
360
361        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
362        return retValue;
363    }   //  createField()
364
365    /**
366     *  {@inheritDoc}
367     */
368    @Override
369    public Optional<MethodSpec> createGetter( final CodeBuilder codeBuilder )
370    {
371        final Optional<MethodSpec> retValue = isNull( m_GetterComposer ) || hasFlag( GETTER_IS_DEFAULT )
372            ? Optional.empty()
373            : Optional.of( m_GetterComposer.apply( requireNonNullArgument( codeBuilder, "codeBuilder" ), this ) );
374
375        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
376        return retValue;
377    }   //  createGetter()
378
379    /**
380     *  {@inheritDoc}
381     */
382    @Override
383    public Optional<MethodSpec> createSetter( final CodeBuilder codeBuilder )
384    {
385        final Optional<MethodSpec> retValue = isNull( m_SetterComposer ) || hasFlag( GETTER_IS_DEFAULT )
386            ? Optional.empty()
387            : Optional.of( m_SetterComposer.apply( requireNonNullArgument( codeBuilder, "codeBuilder" ), this ) );
388
389        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
390        return retValue;
391    }   //  createSetter()
392
393    /**
394     *  {@inheritDoc}
395     */
396    @Override
397    public final Name getAddMethodArgumentName() { return m_AddMethodArgumentName; }
398
399    /**
400     *  <p>{@summary Returns a builder for the 'add' method for this
401     *  property.}</p>
402     *  <p>This is a convenience method that allows to benefit from
403     *  {@link JavaComposer#createMethod(ExecutableElement)}.</p>
404     *
405     *  @return An instance of
406     *      {@link Optional}
407     *      that holds the builder.
408     */
409    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
410    public final Optional<MethodSpec.Builder> getAddMethodBuilder() { return Optional.ofNullable( m_AddMethodBuilder ); }
411
412    /**
413     *  {@inheritDoc}
414     */
415    @Override
416    public final Optional<Name> getAddMethodName() { return Optional.ofNullable( m_AddMethodName ); }
417
418    /**
419     *  {@inheritDoc}
420     */
421    @Override
422    public final OptionalInt getCLIArgumentIndex() { return m_CLIArgumentIndex < 0 ? OptionalInt.empty() : OptionalInt.of( m_CLIArgumentIndex ); }
423

441    public final Optional<List<String>> getCLIOptionNames() { return Optional.ofNullable( m_CLIOptionNames ); }

473    /**
474     *  {@inheritDoc}
475     */
476    @Override
477    public final String getFieldName()
478    {
479        final var retValue = isEmptyOrBlank( m_FieldName ) ? PropertySpec.super.getFieldName() : m_FieldName;
480
481        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
482        return retValue;
483    }   //  getFieldName()
484

587    @Override
588    public final Optional<String> getSystemPropertyName() { return Optional.ofNullable( m_SystemPropertyName ); }

590    /**
591     *  {@inheritDoc}
592     */
593    @Override
594    public final boolean isEnum() { return m_IsEnum; }
595
596    /**
597     *  {@inheritDoc}
598     */
599    @Override
600    public final boolean hasFlag( final PropertyFlag flag ) { return m_PropertyFlags.contains( requireNonNullArgument( flag, "flag" ) ); }
601
602    /**
603     *  {@inheritDoc}
604     */
605    @Override
606    public final PropertySpec merge()
607    {
608        final PropertySpecImpl retValue;
609        if( hasFlag( PROPERTY_IS_SPECIAL ) )
610        {
611            retValue = new PropertySpecImpl( m_SpecialPropertyType.getPropertyName() );
612            final var otherSpec = CodeGenerator.getSpecialPropertySpecification( m_SpecialPropertyType );
613
614            final var flags = EnumSet.copyOf( m_PropertyFlags );
615            flags.addAll( otherSpec.getAllFlags() );
616            retValue.setFlag( flags.toArray( PropertyFlag []::new ) );
617
618            retValue.m_AddMethodArgumentName = m_AddMethodArgumentName;
619            getAddMethodBuilder().ifPresent( retValue::setAddMethodBuilder );
620            retValue.m_AddMethodComposer = otherSpec.getAddMethodComposer().orElse( m_AddMethodComposer );
621            getAddMethodName().ifPresent( retValue::setAddMethodName );
622            getCLIArgumentIndex().ifPresent( retValue::setCLIArgumentIndex );
623            getCLIFormat().ifPresent( retValue::setCLIFormat );
624            getCLIMetaVar().ifPresent( retValue::setCLIMetaVar );
625            getCLIOptionNames().ifPresent( retValue::setCLIOptionNames );
626            getCLIUsage().ifPresent( retValue::setCLIUsage );
627            getCLIUsageKey().ifPresent( retValue::setCLIUsageKey );
628            getCLIValueHandlerClass().ifPresent( retValue::setCLIValueHandlerClass );
629            retValue.setCollectionKind( otherSpec.getCollectionKind() );
630            retValue.m_ConstructorFragmentComposer = otherSpec.getConstructorFragmentComposer().orElse( m_ConstructorFragmentComposer );
631            otherSpec.getEnvironmentVariableName().ifPresentOrElse( retValue::setEnvironmentVariableName, () -> retValue.m_EnvironmentVariableName = null );
632            retValue.setFieldName( otherSpec.getFieldName() ); // Has a side effect in setting retValue.m_FieldComposer â¦
633            retValue.m_FieldComposer = otherSpec.getFieldComposer().orElse( m_FieldComposer );
634            getGetterBuilder().ifPresent( retValue::setGetterBuilder );
635            getGetterMethodName().ifPresent( retValue::setGetterMethodName );
636            retValue.m_GetterComposer = otherSpec.getGetterComposer().orElse( m_GetterComposer );
637            retValue.setGetterReturnType( otherSpec.getGetterReturnType() );
638            otherSpec.getINIComment().ifPresent( c -> retValue.m_INIComment = c );
639            otherSpec.getINIGroup().ifPresent( g -> retValue.m_INIGroup = g );
640            otherSpec.getINIKey().ifPresent( k -> retValue.m_INIKey = k );
641            retValue.setIsEnum( otherSpec.isEnum() );
642            otherSpec.getPrefsAccessorClass().ifPresent( retValue::setPrefsAccessorClass );
643            otherSpec.getPrefsKey().ifPresent( retValue::setPrefsKey );
644            retValue.setPropertyType( otherSpec.getPropertyType() );
645            retValue.m_SetterArgumentName = m_SetterArgumentName;
646            otherSpec.getSystemPrefsPath().ifPresent( retValue::setSystemPrefsPath );
647            getSetterBuilder().ifPresent( retValue::setSetterBuilder );
648            retValue.m_SetterComposer = otherSpec.getSetterComposer().orElse( m_SetterComposer );
649            getSetterMethodName().ifPresent( retValue::setSetterMethodName );
650            retValue.setSpecialPropertyType( m_SpecialPropertyType );
651            otherSpec.getStringConverterClass().ifPresent( retValue::setStringConverterClass );
652            otherSpec.getSystemPropertyName().ifPresentOrElse( retValue::setSystemPropertyName, () -> retValue.m_SystemPropertyName = null );
653        }
654        else
655        {
656            retValue = this;
657        }
658
659        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
660        return retValue;
661    }   //  merge()
662
663    /**
664     *  Sets the name for the 'add' method's argument.
665     *
666     *  @param  name    The name of the argument.
667     */
668    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
669    public final void setAddMethodArgumentName( final Name name )
670    {
671        m_AddMethodArgumentName = requireNonNullArgument( name, "name" );
672    }   //  setAddMethodArgumentName()
673
674    /**
675     *  Sets the builder for the 'add' method of this property.
676     *
677     *  @param  builder The builder; can be {@code null}.
678     */
679    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
680    public final void setAddMethodBuilder( final MethodSpec.Builder builder )
681    {
682        m_AddMethodBuilder = builder;
683    }   //  setAddMethodBuilder()
684
685    /**
686     *  Sets the name of the 'add'' method for this property.
687     *
688     *  @param  name    The name of the setter method.
689     */
690    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
691    public final void setAddMethodName( final Name name )
692    {
693        m_AddMethodName = requireNotEmptyArgument( name, "name" );
694        m_AddMethodComposer = getAddMethodComposer();
695    }   //  setAddMethodName()
696
697    /**
698     *  Sets the index for an argument on the command line.
699     *
700     *  @param  index   The index, starting by 0. A negative value indicates,
701     *      that the value was not set.
702     *
703     *  @see org.tquadrat.foundation.config.Argument#index()
704     */
705    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
706    public final void setCLIArgumentIndex( final int index ) { m_CLIArgumentIndex = index; }
707
708    /**
709     *  Sets the special CLI format.
710     *
711     *  @param  format  The format String; can be {@code null}.
712     *
713     *  @see org.tquadrat.foundation.config.Argument#format()
714     *  @see org.tquadrat.foundation.config.Option#format()
715     */
716    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
717    public final void setCLIFormat( final String format ) { m_CLIFormat = format; }
718
719    /**
720     *  Sets the CLI meta variable.
721     *
722     *  @param  metaVar The meta variable; can be {@code null}.
723     *
724     *  @see org.tquadrat.foundation.config.Argument#metaVar()
725     *  @see org.tquadrat.foundation.config.Option#metaVar()
726     */
727    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
728    public final void setCLIMetaVar( final String metaVar ) { m_CLIMetaVar = metaVar; }
729
730    /**
731     *  <p>{@summary Sets the CLI option names.}</p>
732     *  <p>The first entry of the list is the option name, the others are the
733     *  aliases.</p>
734     *
735     *  @param  names   The name and the aliases for the CLI option for this
736     *      property; can be {@code null}, but may not be empty.
737     *
738     *  @see org.tquadrat.foundation.config.Option#name()
739     *  @see org.tquadrat.foundation.config.Option#aliases()
740     */
741    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
742    public final void setCLIOptionNames( final List<String> names )
743    {
744        m_CLIOptionNames = nonNull( names) ? List.copyOf( requireNotEmptyArgument( names, "names" ) ) : null;
745    }   //  setCLIOptionNames()
746
747    /**
748     *  Sets the CLI usage text.
749     *
750     *  @param  text    The usage text; can be {@code null}.
751     *
752     *  @see org.tquadrat.foundation.config.Argument#usage()
753     *  @see org.tquadrat.foundation.config.Option#usage()
754     */
755    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
756    public final void setCLIUsage( final String text )
757    {
758        m_CLIUsage = text;
759    }   //  setCLIUsage()
760
761    /**
762     *  Sets the CLI usage key.
763     *
764     *  @param  key The usage key; can be {@code null}.
765     *
766     *  @see org.tquadrat.foundation.config.Argument#usageKey()
767     *  @see org.tquadrat.foundation.config.Option#usageKey()
768     */
769    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
770    public final void setCLIUsageKey( final String key )

773    }   //  setCLIUsageKey()
774
775    /**
776     *  Sets the CLI value handler class.
777     *
778     *  @param  handlerClass    The
779     *      {@link TypeName}
780     *      for the value handler class; can be {@code null}.
781     *
782     *  @see org.tquadrat.foundation.config.Argument#handler()
783     *  @see org.tquadrat.foundation.config.Option#handler()
784     *  @see org.tquadrat.foundation.config.cli.CmdLineValueHandler
785     */
786    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
787    public final void setCLIValueHandlerClass( final TypeName handlerClass )
788    {
789        m_CLIValueHandlerClass = handlerClass;
790    }   //  setCLIValueHandlerClass()
791
792    /**
793     *  Sets the kind of collection for this property.
794     *
795     *  @param  collectionKind  The kind of collection.
796     */
797    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
798    public final void setCollectionKind( final CollectionKind collectionKind )
799    {
800        m_CollectionKind = requireNonNullArgument( collectionKind, "collectionKind" );
801    }   //  setCollectionKind()
802
803    /**
804     *  Sets the name of the environment variable that provides the (initial)
805     *  value for this property.
806     *
807     *  @param  name    The name of the environment variable.
808     */
809    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
810    public final void setEnvironmentVariableName( final String name )
811    {
812        m_EnvironmentVariableName = name;
813        if( isNotEmptyOrBlank( name ) )
814        {
815            m_PropertyFlags.add( ENVIRONMENT_VARIABLE );
816            m_ConstructorFragmentComposer = getConstructorFragment4EnvironmentComposer();
817        }
818        else
819        {
820            m_PropertyFlags.remove( ENVIRONMENT_VARIABLE );
821            m_ConstructorFragmentComposer = null;
822        }
823    }   //  setEnvironmentVariableName()
824
825    /**
826     *  Sets the name of the field for the property.
827     *
828     *  @param  name    The field name.
829     */
830    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
831    public final void setFieldName( final String name )
832    {
833        m_FieldName = requireNotEmptyArgument( name, "name" );
834        m_FieldComposer = getFieldComposer();
835    }   //  setFieldName()
836
837    /**
838     *  Sets the given flags to the property.
839     *
840     *  @param  flag    The flags to set.
841     */
842    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
843    public final void setFlag( final PropertyFlag... flag )
844    {
845        final var length = requireNonNullArgument( flag, "flag" ).length;
846        switch( length )
847        {
848            case 0: break /* Do nothing */;
849            case 1: m_PropertyFlags.add( flag [0] ); break;
850            case 2: m_PropertyFlags.addAll( EnumSet.of( flag [0], flag [1] ) ); break;
851            default: m_PropertyFlags.addAll( EnumSet.of( flag [0], copyOfRange( flag, 1, length ) ) ); break;
852        }
853    }   //  setFlag()
854
855    /**
856     *  Sets the builder for the getter of this property.
857     *
858     *  @param  builder The builder; can be {@code null}.
859     */
860    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
861    public final void setGetterBuilder( final MethodSpec.Builder builder )
862    {
863        m_GetterBuilder = builder;
864    }   //  setGetterBuilder()
865
866    /**
867     *  Sets the method name for the getter.
868     *
869     *  @param  name    The method name.
870     */
871    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
872    public final void setGetterMethodName( final Name name )
873    {
874        m_GetterMethodName = requireNotEmptyArgument( name, "name" );
875        m_GetterComposer = getGetterComposer();
876    }   //  setGetterMethodName()
877
878    /**
879     *  Sets the return type for the getter.
880     *
881     *  @param  type    The getter's return type.
882     */
883    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
884    public final void setGetterReturnType( final TypeName type )
885    {
886        m_GetterReturnType = requireNonNullArgument( type, "type" );
887    }   //  setGetterReturnType()
888
889    /**
890     *  Sets the {@code INI} file configuration for this property.
891     *
892     *  @param  group   The group.
893     *  @param  key The key.
894     *  @param  comment The comment; can be {@code null}.
895     */
896    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
897    public final void setINIConfiguration( final String group, final String key, final String comment )
898    {
899        m_INIComment = comment;
900        m_INIGroup = requireNotEmptyArgument( group, "group" );
901        m_INIKey = requireNotEmptyArgument( key, "key" );
902    }   //  setINIConfiguration()
903
904    /**
905     *  Sets the {@code INI} file configuration for this property.
906     *
907     *  @param  configuration   The configuration annotation.
908     */
909    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
910    public void setINIConfiguration( final INIValue configuration )
911    {
912        setINIConfiguration( requireNonNullArgument( configuration, "configuration" ).group(), configuration.key(), configuration.comment() );
913    }   //  setINIConfiguration()
914
915    /**
916     *  Sets the flag that indicates whether the property is an
917     *  {@link Enum enum}
918     *  type.
919     *
920     *  @param  flag    {@code true} if the property type is an {@code enum}
921     *      type, {@code false} otherwise.
922     */
923    public final void setIsEnum( final boolean flag ) { m_IsEnum = flag; }
924
925    /**
926     *  Sets the preferences accessor class for this property.
927     *
928     *  @param  accessorClass   The accessor class; can be {@code null}.
929     */
930    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
931    public final void setPrefsAccessorClass( final TypeName accessorClass )
932    {
933        m_PrefsAccessorClass = accessorClass;
934    }   //  setPrefsAccessorClass()
935
936    /**
937     *  Sets the preferences key for this property.

940     */
941    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
942    public final void setPrefsKey( final String preferenceKey )
943    {
944        m_PrefsKey = preferenceKey;
945    }   //  setPrefsKey
946
947    /**
948     *  Sets the property type.
949     *
950     *  @param  type    The type of the property.
951     */
952    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
953    public final void setPropertyType( final TypeName type )
954    {
955        m_PropertyType = requireNonNullArgument( type, "type" );
956    }   //  setPropertyType()
957
958    /**
959     *  Sets the name for the setter's argument.
960     *
961     *  @param  name    The name of the argument.
962     */
963    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
964    public final void setSetterArgumentName( final Name name )
965    {
966        m_SetterArgumentName = requireNonNullArgument( name, "name" );
967    }   //  setSetterArgumentName()
968
969    /**
970     *  Sets the builder for the setter of this property.
971     *
972     *  @param  builder The builder; can be {@code null}.
973     */
974    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
975    public final void setSetterBuilder( final MethodSpec.Builder builder )
976    {
977        m_SetterBuilder = builder;
978    }   //  setGetterBuilder()
979
980    /**
981     *  Sets the name of the setter method for this property.
982     *
983     *  @param  name    The name of the setter method.
984     */
985    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
986    public void setSetterMethodName( final Name name )
987    {
988        m_SetterMethodName = requireNotEmptyArgument( name, "name" );
989        m_SetterComposer = getSetterComposer();
990    }   //  setSetterMethodName()
991
992    /**
993     *  Sets the speciality type for this property.
994     *
995     *  @param  type    The speciality type.
996     */
997    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
998    public final void setSpecialPropertyType( final SpecialPropertyType type )
999    {
1000        m_SpecialPropertyType = type;
1001        if( nonNull( m_SpecialPropertyType ) )
1002        {
1003            m_PropertyFlags.add( PROPERTY_IS_SPECIAL );
1004        }
1005        else
1006        {
1007            m_PropertyFlags.remove( PROPERTY_IS_SPECIAL );
1008        }
1009    }   //  setSpecialPropertyType()
1010
1011    /**
1012     *  Sets the name for the class that implements
1013     *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.StringConverter}
1014     *  for the type of this property.
1015     *
1016     *  @param  typeName    The String converter class; can be {@code null}.
1017     */
1018    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
1019    public final void setStringConverterClass( final TypeName typeName )
1020    {
1021        m_StringConverterClass = typeName;
1022    }   //  setStringConverterClass()
1023
1024    /**
1025     *  Sets the path for the SYSTEM {@code Preferences} node that holds the
1026     *  initialisation data for this property.
1027     *
1028     *  @param  path    The path.
1029     */
1030    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
1031    public final void setSystemPrefsPath( final String path )
1032    {
1033        m_SystemPrefsPath = path;
1034        if( isNotEmptyOrBlank( path ) )
1035        {
1036            m_PropertyFlags.add( SYSTEM_PREFERENCE );
1037            m_ConstructorFragmentComposer = getConstructorFragment4SystemPreferenceComposer();
1038        }
1039        else
1040        {
1041            m_PropertyFlags.remove( SYSTEM_PREFERENCE );
1042            m_ConstructorFragmentComposer = null;
1043        }
1044    }   //  setSystemPrefsPath()
1045
1046    /**
1047     *  Sets the name of the system property that provides the (initial) value
1048     *  for this property.
1049     *
1050     *  @param  name    The name of the system property.
1051     */
1052    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
1053    public final void setSystemPropertyName( final String name )
1054    {
1055        m_SystemPropertyName = name;
1056        if( isNotEmptyOrBlank( name ) )
1057        {
1058            m_PropertyFlags.add( SYSTEM_PROPERTY );
1059            m_ConstructorFragmentComposer = getConstructorFragment4SystemPropComposer();
1060        }
1061        else
1062        {
1063            m_PropertyFlags.remove( SYSTEM_PROPERTY );
1064            m_ConstructorFragmentComposer = null;
1065        }
1066    }   //  setSystemPropertyName()
1067}
1068//  class PropertySpecImpl
